subtitleNullable: Dataset of Tweets of  Los Angeles News Twitter Account having  20 Categories
descriptionNullable:
The dataset used in this research is a collection of news articles, meticulously gathered to provide a comprehensive overview of various news categories. The dataset comprises a total of 676 entries, each consisting of two distinct fields:

A: LABEL:

This field represents the category of the news article. Each entry is labeled with a category that best describes the content of the news. The categories encompass a wide range of topics, ensuring a diverse and representative sample of news types. The exact categories and their distribution within the dataset are crucial for understanding the diversity and balance of the data.


B: NEWS:

This field contains the text of the news article. The texts
 
are excerpts or summaries of news articles, capturing the essence and key points of the original content. The length, style, and complexity of these texts can vary, reflecting the natural variation found in real-world news articles.

The dataset is designed to facilitate the task of news categorization, a challenge in NLP that involves assigning predefined categories to text data based on its content. The diversity in the categories and the textual content provides a robust platform for evaluating the effectiveness of various NLP models.
